snippet: The steering wheel in a Formula One racecar does more than direct the car’s path. A driver can make more than a dozen adjustments, like limiting his pit speed and shifting gears, without lifting a hand from the wheel.
abstract: Steering wheels on Formula One racecars offer dizzying array of controls; allow drivers to make more than a dozen adjustments, like limiting pit speed and shifting gears, without lifting a hand from the wheel.
lead_paragraph: The steering wheel in a Formula One racecar does more than direct the car’s path. A driver can make more than a dozen adjustments, like limiting his pit speed and shifting gears, without lifting a hand from the wheel.

headline.main: Steering Wheels That Do Much More Than Turn Corners
